Text: Seasons 2 & 3 are now up.  Click on: http://thepiratebay.org/user/Meech to view my torrents.  Seasons 2 & 3 should be at the top.

Okay, I have mixed emotions about this download. On the positive side, the quality is much clearer than the version that I currently have. Additionally, this version is wide screen whereas my version is full screen.

On the negative side, the file extensions are .mkv. Even though some people swear by this file format, it is not the most common nor is it the most popular. By far .avi and .mp4 file formats are more popular than .mkv file extensions.

This all being said, I found an application that may be able to cleanly convert the .mkv files into .mp4 or .avi. It's called simply MKV Converter. If it works, ad if each season is in this format, I will just convert the entire series into a format that I want.

Overall, the quality is excellent and I am glad that I found a higher quality version of this series. Thank you uploader.
Meech you are a top man. Thanks for these uploads I have been looking for these for ages. The quality is great. will seed thanks again.

Excellent rips.  The video is h.264, much better than xvid, audio is untouched AC-3 from the DVD, and there are srt subtitles in the mkv container as well, which any player can toggle on or off.

Anyone whining about the mkv container, or anything at all in the case of meech's The Shield rips, is being ignorant.  If you want soft, blocky xvid then look elsewhere. If you want video that looks and sounds exactly like the DVD then this is it.  Big thanks to the ripper/releaser, great job.
